findings.title: Revert for sqrtPriceX96 >= 2^128
findings.description: The contract reverts when sqrtPriceX96 is greater than or equal to 2^128.

findings.title: Improper Chainlink oracle handling
findings.description: The **ChainLinkOracle** contract exhibits issues in the handling of functions such as **getPrice0** and **getPrice1** due to improper handling of the **latestRoundData()** function.

findings.title: Rounding error in ChainLinkOracle
findings.description: There is a rounding error in the price calculation in the getPrice0 method of ChainLinkOracle contract due to performing rounding before multiplication by 10 ** token1Decimals.

findings.title: No checks if vault is in vaults
findings.description: An operator can burn liquidity from a vault or withdraw manager balance without calling initManagement() first.

findings.title: Useless import
findings.description: **ERC20** import in **SimpleManager.sol** contract isn't used. **Range** import is not needed, cause it's included in **Rebalance** struct.

findings.title: No way to remove vaults and modify vault info
findings.description: The function initManagement() adds a vault to vaults and sets its info, but there is no way to undo this action or modify vault info after initManagement().

findings.title: Max deviation is not bounded
findings.description: In the function initManagement() of SimpleManager, the parameter params.maxDeviation is not bounded from above, allowing an operator to sandwich the rebalance by swapping outside of the rebalance if the vault owner sets the wrong parameter.

findings.title: Code duplicating
findings.description: In the rebalance() function there're two calls to oracle for getting the price of token0 . It can be avoided by making oraclePrice argument instead of sending vaultInfo.oracle to this internal function and moving to get price outside if condition.
